name: cfon

stmt.origin: eqeltrri(cfv(ccf, c0), con0, cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccf, c0)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(ccf, c0), con0)
-| wceq(cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccf, c0)), cfv(ccf, c0))
-| wcel(cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccf, c0)), con0)
body.pretty:
⊢ (cf ` c0)∈ On
⊣ (card `(cf ` c0))=(cf ` c0)
⊣ (card `(cf ` c0))∈ On

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cfv(ccf, c0), con0)
-| wceq(cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccf, c0)), cfv(ccf, c0))
-| wcel(cfv(ccrd, cfv(ccf, c0)), con0)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (cf ` c0)∈ On

comment: The cofinality of any set is an ordinal (although it only makes sense when ` A ` is an ordinal). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2013.)
